Package bzh.plealog.hge.api.hypergraph

The "hypergraph" package provides the interfaces to describe the topology of the data as an hyper-graph.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HDataGraph
    Defines a data hyper-graph describes by a DataGraphModel.
    HDBConnector
    A data connector.
    HDGDataObject
    Defines a graph data object.
    HDGHyperEdge
    Defines a graph hyper edge containing data.
    HDGHyperEdgeFactory
    A hyper edge factory.
    HDGLink
    Defines a graph link.
    HDGObject
    Defines a graph data object.
    HDGVertex
    Defines a graph vertex containing data.
    HDGVertexFactory
    A vertex factory.

Package bzh.plealog.hge.api.hypergraph Description

The "hypergraph" package provides the interfaces to describe the topology of the data as an hyper-graph.

Describing the graph topology

Here, we are really in the core of the system: HDataGraph (a Hyper-graph) is made of HDGVertex and HDGHyperEdge that are connected through HDGLink. HDGVertex and HDGHyperEdge contain HDGDataObject.

Creating the graph from a real data source

A HDataGraph is created using a HDBConnector that is capable of reading a real source of data and convert it into such an hyper-graph.
